nodes.text: The Moonglow Polychemical refinery was an industrial facility on Bogan Boulevard in Shaketown on the planet Gorse, used to refine mined thorilide. Originally run by the company Introsphere, it was taken over by the offshoot Moonglow Polychemical after Introsphere's dissolution. It was in the refinery's lobby that Interstellar Thorilide Guild inspector Lemuel Tharsa began to show symptoms of Shilmer's syndrome, leaving him with a grudge against the facility and the companies that ran it.
